description: Decimal expansion of tangent of 1 degree.
references: Mohammad K. Azarian, Forty-Five Nested Equilateral Triangles and cosecant of 1 degree, Problem 813, College Mathematics Journal, Vol. 36, No. 5, November 2005, p. 413-414.  Solution published in Vol. 37 , No. 5, November 2006, pp. 394-395.
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
